feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.15.0.4361
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 41ce79ccce2b86f5c2006b9ba9d9dab39e02f392 Automated API Docs update
  • 14ae062db28141954a00a058c72a0be51ae6cf24 Fixed: Http Client getting network interfaces on aarch64 [ #2076 ]
  • d55a38da4a0679c27bf077467d65e13c7eead595 New: Allow HEAD requests to ping endpoint
  • ab289cfc868a704cc72b709e8f178b873d59a302 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 12671e99051c06d7fe02fb61bebe423f4637c74f New: Advanced settings toggle in indexer, notification and download client modals
  • a33023b8c6a83d33a65525275dfb6aa028460e6e New: Migrate M-Team - TP to API
  • a3e134ce0bf46993cb9a24926f59b5b6ebae000f Link indexer proxy settings from health page
  • ee7c821cabd4f3cb7531e055d8efc5045c2ae035 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • ee4cf93aee675f535dcafa38bf5649e32cbea228 Improve Indexer Proxy healthcheck messaging
  • 2cacfba81ff2ef65885be07dae113962ea71a6fa Fixed: Task progress messages in the UI
See More * 02e420580e97920e472c0200ef39d886673cf96c Fixed: (SubsPlease) Season search improvements and support for movie searches * d99398d3f8b0c088646ade25b1e38dbc01ed2ef1 Fix tests for PHD * 9ea8335aa0a2278e633bd61946d12c6fb2e9ad65 Update timezone offset for PHD/CZ * 52a91a50b246e60a19120bbf31fb46b2664ddc84 Remove duplicated parameter * 680bf46e25f9cabaa759bdd96e968c4511c8a9fe Fixed: (SceneHD) Category filtering [ #2028 ] * d279c97f159091e6c9c01471cbd3827e46191b73 New: Pass general proxy credentials to FlareSolverr [ #2073 ] * 7d5d338c8e48e3c6a2a71d929812f2daeff3a38b Improve search page button colors [ #2046 ] * 721ae1cac053a9c872e79bb0fa6e4d5b7f9d13a6 Fixed: (Cardigann) Avoid NullRef on forms with `multipart/form-data` * 3881c9d753c2ed6614eaf6a7e6bc513957736904 Remove bulk edit for Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing * 131b344119fd9a76423b5e92bd615a78925b6a9e Automated API Docs update * d226e528810a9233309944367316b75a6fbc9483 Fixed: Move Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing to applications * 583815b4f7a42f103be863214259923bb8c4a013 Bump version to 1.15.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=112&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.16.2.4435
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 5fee2c4cd9e5dcf3a892ba8747e4cdcdad1ff603 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

applications sync * 2f85de6b695e73cef61abf7acc46233c818806f0 Add capabilities to Newznab & Torznab tests * b2ef9d5b0a2d953e061d6ffc1e693972af9fe2fe Fixed: Filter invalid releases without categories or Fixed: Displaying capabilities for Newznab and Torznab feeds (#2083) * 5aefb467905b00bcded63b6e7f0591db20f02b42 Fixed: Check VIP expiration only for enabled indexers [ #2082 ] * 41b043e551932dd8a6cdc1a7bed21e6d2cb7bb7d Fixed: (Cardigann) Log invalid category values * 5447fad1fce6402c534665ba128a13c6f681e890 Fixed: (Cardigann) Deprecate noappend for category and categorydesc * entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.17.2.4511
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 2c5f2187c88af5976c4cd3f14736bf0844c12f17 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 401ef88971e2572663fff4e88e5af53b48f924e1 Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 4fb3754048634381f226205fd9acd615154bf911 Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page
  • 596efe8fb0f99a4ece555c0f3ce6e5b44ba883ca New: Dark theme for login screen
  • 076a4f2574a4bd83665182933340505080e45b77 Fix class name for AppIndexerMapRepository
  • 9561371a47f118bd161652a9243a51fb4ba23667 Automated API Docs update
  • 16254cf5f915602e398312a2300bde3f8a99c34c New: Option to select download client when multiple of the same type are configured
  • 649a03e5a09fe8a2d25da49281c45141d0320a18 New: Config file setting to disable log database (#2123)
  • dd21d9b521b37ce92f85a6aac3989a60ccf5e67b Fixed: Allow decimals for Seed Ratio
  • 68b895d2ad074de2a3b267039c1cfe4797fc18be Fixed: Don't share settings for same cached definition in CardigannRequestGenerator

04bb0c51b1b45fcc7f99d07ad4723ef7a55ca89b New: Optionally use Environment Variables for settings in config.xml * d2e9621de946b9f01268d92f7533d7920286bae0 Bump version to 1.17.2 * cb673ddc42df406ad9779481a7b5ae13e41f0649 New: Host column in history and more info * 440618f2b6aa7ec05b9e7f07689558864e515b9e Fixed: Initialize databases after app folder migrations * ae79d456649361e1003035416aac182aa6aadd98 Update Sentry SDK add features * 1877ccb51341e92fee8361f374ef4ce4d90cab31 Update Pull Request Labeler config for v5 * b3098f2e4c79181da71c05186f19f63a314f0f21 Use newer Node.js task for in pipelines * 3e0af062c12728686c362489ff717feca69def60 Parameter binding for API requests * 858f85c50d4492cdeb3ab893d870ab3896e7a751 Fix translations for proxy validation * 938848be6556d3281ef2fc3b2b61042c3bccc714 (ci): update action version * 615f5899cc034de45021e2ef168daf568b6c9a24 Fixed: (TorrentDay) Update base urls and MST * 5a6b1313e8147c0b37bca00fae2c2cdb06674e4d Validate that folders in paths don't start or end with a space * ab7debb34b98a65512c174f62526797d359e451e Improve paths longer than 256 on Windows failing to hardlink * eee21de79585c0a8306491d2eafaa7fd627ccb0e Fixed: Handle download redirects to magnet links * 15fabbe7d087b3696a14795d9bb7c7cd2ee04628 Bump version to 1.17.1 * 6aef48c6e733725e77d7e918311abe7db5fd0c7b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b29bc923fc870b9f2c0582ca20db0d16adb541d5 Fixed: Don't reset sorting, columns and selected filter on clear releases [ #2112 ] * b223e9b0cca53aa4362a2abb09e44e51d16cbada Should not empty install folder, MirrorFolder will take care of it. * 77a982a7dadea51b95db3b813fa31f7272509165 Fixed: Retrying download on not suppressed HTTP errors * ab3dc765b42989c7147a6085d6ddb13200604b96 Database corruption message linking to wiki * 0261201360ae7eb7d8feb1751cf3afeb3deb7184 Fixed: (GazelleGames) Update categories * 1da3954879184098d7605b13d428a62c6b2986f4 New: (GazelleGames) Freeleech only option * 742dd5ff54a9fb95d66d96e2c7933b1d62aacd2d Update BTN tests * a85406e3b7871fac37b9bb506d2d83ba15848d4e Fixed: (BroadcasTheNet) Append wildcard when searching for single episodes * 73cdaf3d4487ac84cc6e3faaa45c569de3838a54 Bump NUnit and Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk * e26fa2dbf4b1256400699125f3cb39fa97375c9a Fixed: (Anidex) Support season and episode for TV searches * 64be68a22d38e7ac24cdc0611e63ad0be37df0ff Bump dotnet to 6.0.29 * 478a18596864bc74c35a406b8bce7c3b15aa71f7 Convert createDimensionsSelector to typescript * 4ff5d11a03eefd84f1287d7f7fb44bc966aee223 Bump frontend dependencies * 6000952b767e11fa5ca0bfc73a56f91d72fcfe5e Bump version to 1.17.0 This list of changes was [auto entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.18.0.4543
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 6e01f3187a7b37816bcd415edd8f4466325d5aa3 New: (UI) Detailed error message for inner exception in indexers validation
  • 468436b9f79dd68705daedc71617a655158d4dc4 Fixed: Remove extraneous rate limiting for grabs [ #2140 ]
  • 76c288a6e4879bf825833fafe81984d1bb5a5fa0 Fixed: Authentication issues with Cardigann definitions having captcha [ #2139 ]
  • f95f67a7ca3e274cd0b5abbac487eb914fccd0bb New: (Cardigann) Bump minimum version to v10
  • 11864247eb970932a7547ff57a801253a50d91fe Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk and Polly
  • 74509ea7c9f198116983b1c97083b5bb17b92e45 Fixed: (MyAnonamouse) Don't die when no results on paginated queries
  • 948fe0a6dc5795a28fe171b1b89084ba5d6d0fc9 Fixed: Trimming slashes from UrlBase when using environment variable
  • a4257cbcdee421229194102c03148ac9dd6a70fe Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7
  • 2929c3c8980e90c3769565706c591336b5ea5997 Bump version to 1.18.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.19.0.4568
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 55fa1ec637ab9d072b10ec3d7a3c0738f35663e6 Small improvements to IndexerNoDefinitionCheck
  • b27a3d8272e96862d23577074afe408728388743 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 089d450b46bb57d5aa3719ae9ab2f384c3d36cb5 Fixed: (M-Team-TP) New API path
  • 358ac7434d106cabc9a54b9a1034dccf020fc460 Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10
  • 9cd505fd8a52900dffd6532be0e2800254920cf4 Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3
  • 20ac2687df08ccf1931940c2e449b800a0b39fe9 New: Ignore inaccessible folders when getting folders
  • 9f075c09a2c12cedb7e58c9478a7faf4eac8c664 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 3793538ba42bf2ae40f45670de4dca63d08c5b96 Use tooltip component for detailed error message
  • 4c4b16d234a3da2da44fbd470f4a8226f9b3ea4b Fixed: (FileList) Parsing poorly padded IMDb Ids
  • f5790bec2ed68db21b65be4e97d59f2e13a653e8 HD-Space switched to Cardigann YML
See More * 6c0d08de56ceccb8070b8328250831961fae19c6 Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers * ba344756b119c1d70c50c502d7192dc095cb8492 Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly * dfda86aca3b2061c5ae20229e0c4e71537a2aaf4 Automated API Docs update * df6f83ed69baf4578e6aa77c87808c28fad5a128 Increase timeout for docs * 218d92a1ac660e8dee03ffed23633ebad9753ade docs: use application specific to platform * df2b529d01a13336571801c87f6f54634f64718c Bump Swashbuckle to 6.6.2 * 0ef42dbb4d583981169110e326b735cce80a1ea3 Display downtime message for Nebulance * 1a428197b2064b39199c58f5e3fcce97320753a5 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 09d7983845236e0b4ea311a1169850d34f2f72f1 Bump version to 1.19.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=128&_a=release-summary).
